output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - CMF 11240017 is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda.
2. Refers to candidates: - Direct reference to Nicolae-Ionel CIUCĂ (PNL presidential candidate) - Indirect reference to Klaus Iohannis (not a candidate, but used as a political argument) - Implicit reference to Marcel Ciolacu (as this is from PSD)
3. Addresses wide population: - Yes, this is a paid advertisement with significant reach (15,000-19,999 impressions) - Uses direct addressing to voters ("Voi decideți...") - Clear public messaging format
4. Electoral objective: - Clear intention to influence voting behavior - Explicit statement "Fiecare vot pentru Ciucă și PNL este un vot pentru «Guvernul Iohannis»!" - Uses negative association tactics to discourage voting for Ciucă - Contains direct call to action regarding voting decisions
5. Journalism/Personal Opinion: - This is not journalistic content - It's clear campaign messaging with political intent - Contains partisan political messaging rather than objective information

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post clearly constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Directly targets a presidential candidate (Ciucă) - Uses negative campaigning tactics - Has clear electoral objective - Makes direct appeals to voters - Is a paid advertisement with significant reach - Contains explicit voting-related messaging
conclusion.message-for-police: Partidul Social Democrat Org. Jud. Botosani, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin distribuirea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala (ID postare Facebook: 1101884608608594) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale. Postarea, care include numarul CMF 11240017, contine mesaje directe de influentare a votului impotriva candidatului Nicolae-Ionel Ciuca, folosind afirmatii precum "Fiecare vot pentru Ciucă și PNL este un vot pentru Guvernul Iohannis" si "Voi decideți dacă îl vreți sau nu pe Iohannis premier!", reprezentand astfel o forma clara de propaganda electorala activa dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu intentia vadita de a influenta comportamentul electoral al alegatorilor in ziua votului.
